## Source: ossf-package-analysis (f82a5ba62b790856947d686397170162bf743b168fd9d66008ed6501b465d5af)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'cephlib' @ 0.0.2 (pypi) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
